articles.title: Microsoft reveals its rejected Start menu redesigns
articles.description: Microsoft has released images of its rejected Start menu redesigns. The concept designs were tested with hundreds of people, before a final design was selected.

articles.title: Asigra improves SaaS app data restorability
articles.description: Asigra has unveiled SaaSAssure 2025, its latest data protection platform, now featuring granular restore and automatic discovery.

articles.title: Google New Logo: Google Changes Its Logo For The First Time In 10 Years
articles.description: Google New Logo 2025: This is the first significant graphic upgrade Google has made to their iconic "G" logo in almost ten years, a quiet modification with a new gradient design.

articles.title: Best Garmin deal: Save $50 on Garmin Forerunner 165
articles.description: As of May 13, the Garmin Forerunner 165 is on sale at Amazon for $199.99. This is 20% off its list price of $249.99.

articles.title: Jollibee powers up with GameJoyCon and GameJoy combos
articles.description: Jollibee takes its first step into the gaming world with GameJoyCon and GameJoy Combos, offering gamers a unique way to fuel up and level up.

articles.title: Game publishers rush to fill fall 2025 gap left by GTA VI delay

articles.title: ‘Take photos and livestream with your glasses’: Ray-Ban Meta smart wearables set to launch in India
